name: GOTfacts
0:
”Alexa open GOT facts”
”Alexa ask GOT facts to give me some information about GOT.”
”Alexa ask GOT facts to tell me a GOT fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. o. t. facts
des: The name of this Skill is GOT facts. This is a Trivia based skill which provides the user with the interesting and sometimes mind-blowing facts about the Game Of Throne TV show. It gives random facts about characters, scenes, author etc.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
